Author: gimmethatdamnavocado
Text: My roommate is exactly the same. I’m not even recovered but she’ll walk around the house with just her sports bra and short shorts on. She’ll talk about how she thinks if she were to diet, her abs would show. She would eat junk food and would snack late at night when I am trying my best to stop thinking about food...

Author: lilmisssuccubus
Text: Your roommate sounds really rude. She doesn’t sound like she’s your friend, I would never say stuff like that if I knew that my roommates trying to recover.
